com.metsci.glimpse.layout
Interface GlimpseLayoutManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
GlimpseLayoutManagerMig
public interface GlimpseLayoutManager

An interface for classes which can layout GlimpseLayouts (adjusting their bounds based on some layout scheme).

ulman
